# round

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of round is to ... round numbers

## Installation

You can install the development version of round from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("martinasladek/round")
```

## Example


```{r example}
library(round)
x <- 0.5
round::round(0.5)
```
